reviewText:
As a poetry fan, each episode kept me smiling & laughing. Each of the poets are diverse in their own way & are enjoyable to watch.

Definitely a must-have for all creative writers & poetry heads like me!

Best poetry purchase from Amazon, hands down :)
I got this series for my boyfriend because he loves the show and had a hard time finding the DVDs. Its all six seasons of Def Poetry Jam hosted by Mos Def!!!!!!!

Russell Simmons Presents Def Poetry: Seasons 1-6. If you like poetry, then this is a must buy! I regretted buying it after the first 3 minutes, then the next poets was NICE! Def wish it was more seasons.

I know there is no image and this worried me at first but I decided to buy it anyway. I got exactly what I was looking for :) All 6 seasons on Def Poetry Jam are on here with each season having about 4 episodes!! This is exactly what I wanted.
These DVDs are great! I can watch them back to back and they still keep my interest. Anyone  who likes words, is creative and remotely a thinker should love this series
Great series...we put it in on new years & watched 6 straight hours, def purchase!!!!
We need more of this kind of thing!
It met all  aspects of my expectations. I give credit where it's due and this item is one of those I would not hesitative to give a five star rating.

Anyone familiar with this series already knows how great the poetry and performances are. Those of you who aren't familiar with Def Poetry but are curious about spoken word performances should definitely check this out.
I have been looking for this set for years! I loved the show and I really need this DVD set to be available again!!
I got to hear poems write by all kinds people. Also it wasn't the same person over and over again.
I can't speak highly enough about the entire Def Poetry series. Except that maybe it needs to be put back on the air. The set was in excellent condition and well worth the money spent.
I was also concerned for the legitimacy of this product, but was completely satisfied with the quality and packaging when it came through to me.
I saw a few episodes and wanted to see what the earlier seasons were about. I couldn't be happier! Great purchase.
Great Poets. I enjoyed listening to their skill and words. Wished there were more seasons to showcase more artists. Good series.
